articles.title: Apple projects tariff costs will hit $1.1B next quarter

articles.title: Reddit revenue soars as it bets on AI and advertising

articles.title: Apple has now sold 3 billion iPhones
articles.description: The rate of iPhone sales growth has accelerated too. This uptick in sales might be temporary, though.

articles.title: Apple plans to ‘significantly’ grow AI investments, Cook says
articles.description: Apple is open to M&A to accelerate its AI strategy, and says it's made seven acquisitions this year so far.

articles.title: Iconiq’s Will Griffith explains how his firm celebrated Figma’s IPO and why investors sold shares
articles.description: Will Griffith is a seed investor in Figma. Investors didn't want to sell millions of shares. He explains why they did it anyway.

articles.title: Enterprises prefer Anthropic’s AI models over anyone else’s, including OpenAI’s
articles.description: Anthropic holds 32% of enterprise LLM market share by usage. This is a sharp reversal from just two years ago when OpenAI held 50%.

articles.title: Twitter’s former Trust and Safety head details the challenges facing decentralized social platforms
articles.description: Yoel Roth shares concerns about the open social web's ability to combat misinformation, spam, and other illegal content.

articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Your public ChatGPT queries are getting indexed by Google and other search engines
articles.description: Search engines are indexing links to ChatGPT conversations that have been made sharable with a link.

articles.title: Figma’s stock soared in its highly anticipated IPO, market cap instantly hit $45B
articles.description: There has been so much demand for this stock that people on X are posting funny pictures of their orders being fulfilled.

articles.title: Design and development shop the Iconfactory is selling some apps — and AI is partially to blame
articles.description: Side products can no longer be maintained, even if they have "loads of happy and loyal customers," as the Iconfactory's co-founder, Ged Maheux, says.

articles.title: Quora’s Poe releases a developer API with access to a bouquet of AI models
articles.description: Quora's Poe platform is releasing an API to let developers access more than 100 models across text, image, video, and voice.

articles.description: The 15-year-old chipmaker saw its shares climb 61% above its IPO price by the close of its first trading day.
